content.html: It's a movie about a guy who takes estrogen, has his eyes opened to the real world, chooses a new name to reflect his true self, and has a villain who continues to deadname him, and people will still claim there's nothing related to being trans in the story.
content.value: It's a movie about a guy who takes estrogen, has his eyes opened to the real world, chooses a new name to reflect his true self, and has a villain who continues to deadname him, and people will still claim there's nothing related to being trans in the story.
